Uses of Class
com.opengamma.strata.product.cms.CmsLeg.Builder

  • Packages that use CmsLeg.Builder 
    Package Description
    com.opengamma.strata.product.cms
    Entity objects describing Constant Maturity Swap (CMS) or CMS cap/floor.

    • Uses of CmsLeg.Builder in com.opengamma.strata.product.cms

      Methods in com.opengamma.strata.product.cms that return CmsLeg.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static CmsLeg.Builder CmsLeg.builder()
      Returns a builder used to create an instance of the bean.
      CmsLeg.Builder CmsLeg.Meta.builder()  
      CmsLeg.Builder CmsLeg.Builder.capSchedule​(ValueSchedule capSchedule)
      Sets the cap schedule, optional.
      CmsLeg.Builder CmsLeg.Builder.currency​(Currency currency)
      Sets the currency of the leg associated with the notional.
      CmsLeg.Builder CmsLeg.Builder.dayCount​(DayCount dayCount)
      Sets the day count convention.
      CmsLeg.Builder CmsLeg.Builder.fixingDateOffset​(DaysAdjustment fixingDateOffset)
      Sets the offset of the fixing date from each adjusted reset date.
      CmsLeg.Builder CmsLeg.Builder.fixingRelativeTo​(FixingRelativeTo fixingRelativeTo)
      Sets the base date that each fixing is made relative to, defaulted to 'PeriodStart'.
      CmsLeg.Builder CmsLeg.Builder.floorSchedule​(ValueSchedule floorSchedule)
      Sets the floor schedule, optional.
      CmsLeg.Builder CmsLeg.Builder.index​(SwapIndex index)
      Sets the swap index.
      CmsLeg.Builder CmsLeg.Builder.notional​(ValueSchedule notional)
      Sets the notional amount, must be non-negative.
      CmsLeg.Builder CmsLeg.Builder.paymentDateOffset​(DaysAdjustment paymentDateOffset)
      Sets the offset of payment from the base calculation period date.
      CmsLeg.Builder CmsLeg.Builder.paymentSchedule​(PeriodicSchedule paymentSchedule)
      Sets the periodic payment schedule.
      CmsLeg.Builder CmsLeg.Builder.payReceive​(PayReceive payReceive)
      Sets whether the leg is pay or receive.
      CmsLeg.Builder CmsLeg.Builder.set​(String propertyName, Object newValue)  
      CmsLeg.Builder CmsLeg.Builder.set​(org.joda.beans.MetaProperty<?> property, Object value)  
      CmsLeg.Builder CmsLeg.toBuilder()
      Returns a builder that allows this bean to be mutated.
